subject: Football
College Athletics
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: If either Louisville or Rutgers gets through the skeptical voters and dumbfounded computers of the B.C.S. and qualifies for the championship game, there will still be a toxic smog of doubt over the matchup.
